flawed_nl_solution:
He has already done 264 this week because 34 + 20 + 123 + 64 + 23 = <<34+20+123+64+23=264>>264.
If he does 57 he will have done as many as last week because 324 - 264 = <<324-264=57>>57
He has to do 58 on Saturday because 57 + 1 = <<57+1=58>>58

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 57. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
